name: Moon Miner (SquaredWaffles)
description:
Introducing Moon Miner! 

Explore below the surface of a mysterious moon and try to escape! Play as the teenage robot Jecky from the planet Quazal to uncover the mysteries that lie deep within the caves. Piece together the story of an ancient robot who came before you and follow in his footsteps. Will you escape or be trapped forever?

Currently the game is free to play in the web browser with all features included except saving progress. Moon Miner has about 1-2 hours of gameplay so you can play the whole thing  in the browser. To download the full version with saving included I'm only asking for $1. If you feel the game is fun to play and a worthwhile experience please consider donating by clicking download and entering the amount you think this game deserves. Any support is greatly appreciated and will give me the ability and motivation to keep making cool games. Thanks!

Controls

Movement - W A S D or ARROW KEYS 

Jump/Jetpack - SPACE

Interact/Inventory - E

Use Crystal/Recharge - R

Scan - Q

Pause/Back - ESCAPE

Digging - move in a direction then LEFT CLICK

Teleporting - move in a direction then RIGHT CLICK or hold T

The Future of Moon Miner

At the time of upload Moon Miner is a finished game. I'm sure there will be bugs and lots of room for improvement, so if you have suggestions or find any bugs please tell me in the comments below. If there is enough people playing and supporting the game I will continue to update it with bug fixes and cool new features.

This is the first game I have ever made and published I hope you enjoy!
